name: Shapes (itch) (PaulDoodles)
description: In a world gone mad.... well not mad exactly.... Well, imagine every one is a shape, yep that make a lot more sense...Ahem...In a world where everyone is a shape, thats gone mad. One shape will rise.....Shapes.Dramatic, i like it.Now play.Shapes was made entirely with Fungus SDK & Unity 3D.
